title: Girl assaulted at shopping centre
text:
Top Ryde Shopping Centre is scene of indecent assault Steven Deare, Northern District Times January 11, 2017 2:04pm 
POLICE have appealed for witnesses after a teenage girl was indecently assaulted outside Top Ryde Shopping Centre yesterday. 
The 17-year-old was walking across the pedestrian bridge from the council chambers to the centre when a man approached her. 
The man indecently assaulted her, the girl screamed, and the man away downstairs to Devlin St. 
She was not hurt. 
Police have reviewed CCTV and hope the public can help identify a man who might be able to assist with their inquiries. 
The man is described as being of caucasian appearance, in his late 20s with a chubby build, 180cm tall, brown medium-length curly hair. At the time he was wearing a dark T-shirt. 
Anyone with information about the man should call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
